Asheville.Judge Junius G. Adams House: Judge Junius G. Adams House is a historic home located at 11 Stuyvesant Road, Biltmore Forest, Buncombe County, North Carolina. It was built in 1921, and is a two-story, rectangular plan, Tudor Revival style dwelling. It has rough-faced stone veneer on the first story and false half-timbering on the second, with a slate gable roof.
